name: OnSale
description:
Small Single Level Game Completed for WGJ-149.

Team of One. All original art, music, sound effect created during event for event.

Will Continue to build and clean up once Game Jam has finished. 

Project is hosted on GitHub and can provide access if wanted. 

Wish list:

- More Levels

- Randomize/Endless mode for a quick challenge

- Menu music worked

- Better game music 

- Better Level Tile Set

- Other Shopper(s)
